Text:
function EP_BAD_12()

  -- なぜなのボク姫
  SaveData.Title = "なぜなのボク姫"

  SAVE()

  -- //エルメスルートEP4の姫選挙に失敗した際に発生。

LAYER_CLEAR_ALL()

LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)

  -- //SE：開始音（ﾃﾚﾃﾃﾚﾃﾃｰ!!）
  PLAY_SE("SEz006.wav")
  -- //BG：なぜなのボク姫（開始）

  MSG([[ So far in the Bokuhime Project! ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(10,"BG005ae")
  LAYER_SCALE(10,80,80)
  LAYER_POSITION(10,-200,200)
  LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(10,200,200,20000,Ease.OutSine)
  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_ERI01ba")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,300,0)
  LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-300,0,20000,Ease.OutSine)
  LAYER_LOAD(45,"BU_DAR01aa")
  LAYER_ALPHA(45,0)
  LAYER_POSITION(45,0,0)
  LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(45,200,0,20000,Ease.OutSine)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

  MSG([[ Minato, who fights transformed as the righteous crossdressing boy "Erika Ikusa," makes a desperate infiltration into the Himegami residence to rescue the important woman Arumeria! ]])

  MSG([[ However, appearing before him was his former ally, Daria! ]])

  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
  LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,1000,Ease.Liner)
  LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(45,255,1000,Ease.Liner)
  WAIT(1000)
  LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

  MSG([[ Facing the serious Daria, Minato is defeated without any means to fight back! Is there a way to counter the side guard techniques Daria wields――? ]])

  -- //BG：なぜなのボク姫背景
  LAYER_LOAD(45,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(10,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG028ba")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask023",1000,false)

  PLAY_BGM("BGM07.wav")
  -- //BU：エリカ（悲しみ）、アキラ・メヒＴ（通常）
  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERI01da")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04aa")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano173.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "Alright, it’s the usual hint corner, it’s Bokuhime time! Let’s quickly come up with a strategy to defeat Daria." ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERI01ca")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano174.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "W-why did it start with a synopsis like a morning superhero show? What’s about to begin?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano175.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "Hehe, following the hero’s example, we’ve prepared a power-up event to win against Daria." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano176.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "To be honest, there’s nothing more advice I can give. So I thought training in martial arts in this alternate space would be best." ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERI01aa")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano177.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "Huh? Memories in this space don’t carry over to reality, right...?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano178.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "Yes, leaving the details aside, let’s start right away. The training subject is a battle against yourself." ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERI01ca")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano179.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "A-a battle against myself?" ]])

  -- //BU：エリカ（驚き）、アキラ・メヒＴ（通常）、エリカ・メイド（真剣）
  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERI01da")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04aa")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_ERI07bb")
  LAYER_POSITION(60,0,-300)
  LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano180.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Maid Erika】
 "I’ve decided on the cleaning plan. Now, shall we begin serving?" ]])

  MSG([[ Erika Ikusa Maid――joins the fight! ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERI01ga")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano181.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "An-another me!? What on earth is going on!?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano182.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "I’ve summoned the parallel world’s Erika Ikusa. And it’s not just one." ]])

  --LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

  -- //BU：エリカ（焦り）、エリカ・体操服（真剣）、エリカ・メイド（真剣）
  --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERI01ga")
  --LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  --LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_ERI07ba")
  --LAYER_POSITION(60,400,0)
  LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_ERI04bb")
  LAYER_POSITION(65,1100,0)
  LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(65,800,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano183.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Gym Uniform Erika】
 "Another me, come run a lap with me!" ]])

  MSG([[ Erika Ikusa Race――joins the fight! ]])

  -- //BU：エリカ（焦り）、エリカ・病院服（驚き）、エリカ・体操服（真剣）、エリカ・メイド（真剣）
  --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERI01ga")
  --LAYER_POSITION(50,-750,0)
  --LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_ERI07ba")
  --LAYER_POSITION(60,750,0)
  --LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_ERI04ba")
  --LAYER_POSITION(60,500,0)
  LAYER_LOAD(70,"BU_ERI05ca")
  LAYER_POSITION(70,-1100,0)
  LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(70,-800,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano184.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Hospitalized Erika】
 "I’m a crossdressing patient...? No way... They’re trying to trick me." ]])

  MSG([[ Erika Ikusa Patient――joins the fight! ]])

  -- //BU：エリカ（悲しみ）、エリカ・アイドル（笑顔）、エリカ・病院服（驚き）、エリカ・体操服（真剣）、エリカ・メイド（真剣）
  --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERI01ga")
  --LAYER_POSITION(50,-800,0)
  --LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_ERI07ba")
  --LAYER_POSITION(60,800,0)
  --LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_ERI04ba")
  --LAYER_POSITION(60,600,0)
  --LAYER_LOAD(70,"BU_ERI05ca")
  --LAYER_POSITION(70,600,0)
  LAYER_LOAD(75,"BUL_ERI06ea")
  LAYER_SCALE(75,120,120)
  LAYER_POSITION(75,0,-300)
  LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(75,0,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano185.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Idol Erika】
 "From here on, it’s my stage." ]])

  MSG([[ Erika Ikusa Raibu <Live>――joins the fight! ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(70,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(75,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

  -- //BU：アキラ・メヒＴ（通常）
  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04aa")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,1000,0)
  LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,800,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano186.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "It’s the moment various Erikas meet, let’s celebrate. But only one can seize the trump card of fate... You must fight to survive." ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04ba")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,800,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano187.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "Now, it’s climax from the start! Burn your life aiming to become the strongest crossdressing boy!" ]])

  -- //BU：エリカ（悲しみ）、エリカ・アイドル（悲しみ）、エリカ・病院服（悲しみ）、エリカ・体操服（悲しみ）、エリカ・メイド（悲しみ）
  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERI05da")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-1000,0)
  LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-800,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
  LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_ERI01da")
  LAYER_POSITION(60,-700,0)
  LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,-500,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
  LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_ERI07da")
  LAYER_POSITION(65,-400,0)
  LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(65,-200,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
  LAYER_LOAD(70,"BU_ERI04da")
  LAYER_POSITION(70,-100,0)
  LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(70,100,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
  LAYER_LOAD(75,"BU_ERI06da")
  LAYER_POSITION(75,200,0)
  LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(75,400,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano188.wav")
  MSG([[
  【All Erikas】
 "Ah, fighting is a bit..." ]])

  --LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
  --LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
  --LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
  --LAYER_LOAD(70,"")
  --LAYER_LOAD(75,"")
  -- //BU：アキラ・メヒＴ（悲しみ）
  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04da")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,800,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",100,true)

  LAYER_EFFECT(55,6,30,30,500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano189.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "Zukoo" ]])


  LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(70,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(75,"")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04fa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano190.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "Well, this kindness is Minachin’s charm that never changes across worlds. Even without getting stronger, I’m sure Minachin can defeat Daria." ]])

  -- //BG：なぜなのボク姫（おわり）
  STOP_BGM(1000)
  LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)
  WAIT_INPUT(1000)
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG028ca")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)
  WAIT_INPUT(1000)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano191.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "Ah, how about a cooking battle? I’m really curious about how good the me from the parallel world is at cooking." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano192.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "No, the cooking skills probably wouldn’t change..." ]])

  -- //エルメスルート第４章［結-3］冒頭から再開
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
  WAIT_INPUT(1000)

  -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
WAIT_INPUT(1000)

SystemSaveData.IsClearEP_BAD_12 = true;
ScenarioManager.Next(SaveData.BadNextScenario)
SaveData.BadNextScenario = ""

end
